info.title: SFI Connect API
info.description:
**SFI Connect** is the part of SFI that runs on the SAP Cloud Platform and
connects it to other IoT Platforms.
        
An **platform** is a software system that monitors several signals.
An example for such a platform is a condition monitoring system, or an
IoT Cloud offering like Cumulocity.
        
A **connection** is all data that SFI Connect needs to connect to an 
**platform**, e.g. credentials.        
        
A **signal** is a thing that creates measurements, oftentimes a sensor.
        
A **measurement** is one concrete data point like 5â„ƒ.
        
An **alert** is generated by the IoT platform when a certain condition
occurs. It is related to one or more signals.
